Description:
ENTICING OPTIONS IN A PRIME LOCATION
Occupying a substantial 530m2, offering immediate lifestyle appeal, along with a myriad of options to enhance, expand or renew in the future (STCA) 47 Eastleigh Avenue, delivers the perfect balance of comfort and opportunity for those ready to take the next step in their real estate journey!
Surrounded by picturesque gardens, in a prime location, renowned for being family-friendly & prized for its convenience; close to transport, endless recreational options, popular schools, with easy access to Milleara Shopping Centre, and close to both the Calder Freeway and the Ring Road, generous proportions, timeless aesthetics, and a dream location are just some of the endearing attributes of this impressive property.
Whether you love it for its classic beauty, or for the allure of its unbeatable future potential, it presents one lucky purchaser the chance to move straight in or update further for a grand return!
Beyond a pretty façade, double doors beckon you inside.
Stepping over the threshold, an inexplicable feeling of warmth embraces you.
Packed full of happy memories, with retro touches a real highlight, sparkling windows introduce an abundance of natural light and the eminently flexible configuration brilliantly accentuates the sense of space throughout.
Crafted for comfort, delight in the unique combination of privacy, space & family sharing as the impressive residence flows seamlessly from one space to the next, and effortlessly from inside to out.
Offering the ultimate in versatility and availing itself perfectly to a multitude of possible configurations, in addition to the sundrenched capacious living at the front of the residence, at the heart of the home is the family hub. An informal open-plan kitchen, dining & lounge area, it affords the lucky occupants, superior comfort, and wonderful daily practicality and flexibility.
Anchored by a moveable island bench, the impressive kitchen serves in style!
Wonderfully functional, with a full suite of quality appliances (including Fisher & Paykel dishwasher drawers) an abundance of storage & preparation space, and direct access outside, its set to impress even the busiest home cook!
Escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life as you drift off to sleep in your secluded master suite.
Cleverly positioned at the front of the house, ensuring absolute parental privacy, youll love the space on offer, the accompanying spacious walk-in robe, and the bright en suite bathroom.
Rounding out the accommodation are two generously proportioned secondary bedrooms.
Well away from the master, with beautiful polished wooden floorboards underfoot, they are serviced by a bright family bathroom and separate toilet.
Outside, accessible from both the lounge & the family hub, discover the impressively expansive all-season living area.
Equipped for everyday enjoyment, alfresco dining, family get-togethers, and perfect for entertaining, it really does offer something for everyone!
Beyond, you will simply love what you find!
Offering plenty of off-street vehicle accommodation, youll discover a wonderful extended driveway.
At its end, delight in the detached garage - the perfect playground for a tradie, car enthusiast, or prime set up for a dream man cave!
Not forgetting the kids, and furry friends, there is also a sun-drenched grassed backyard, where theyll joyfully play and while away their days!
Allowing you to utilize the entire block, and offering peace of mind and security, the residence is also fully secured behind a fence complete with double entry gates.
Other highlights include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, wool carpeting, new side boundary fencing, garden shed, water tank, and family-sized laundry,
Offering prized investment credentials, complete with a residence thats performed perfectly in the past, remains totally functional for the present, and provides huge potential for the future this is an opportunity you wont want to pass up!
For more information, please call Ben Roberts on 0421 883 801 or Mary Roberts on 0433 991 924

Set on a substantial block of land (approx 582sqm), the home itself showcases three genuinely large main bedrooms (all with BIRs), together with a private master ensuite and main central bathroom. High ceilings throughout, the home also features ducted heating and refrigerated cooling, full-size laundry, ample linen storage and internal entry into the oversized double garage. A short stroll to McNamara Avenue shops and cafes, local parks and sports facilities, it's also close to public transport options (buses and trams), St Christopher's Catholic Primary School, as well as Westfield Shopping Centre, Keilor Road restaurants and easy freeway access.
